docs.lead_paragraph: Producing results it said would be good enough for regulatory approval, Arena Pharmaceuticals said its experimental obesity drug had succeeded in its first late-stage clinical trial.

headline.seo: Obesity Drug by Arena Has an Effect, but a Limited One
headline.main: Obesity Drug Clears Trial, Arena Says
headline.print_headline: Drug Shows An Effect On Obesity, But Limited

docs.lead_paragraph: New results from a large study suggest that the drugs known as statins may have a benefit beyond lowering cholesterol.
